data.name: Lettercode
data.description:
You are given a string composed of numbers between 0 and 99 intercalated with letters from a to z (all lowercase). The output should be a string in wich each pair of number(n) and letter is represented by the letter repeated n times. To avoid generating excesively large strings, the function must substitute every ten character repetition for the one of the same character in uppercase.

explained example:
  
      '3a21b': 3a -> 'aaa', 21b -> 'BBb'
      
      result -> 'aaaBBb'
      
Examples:

      '' -> ''
      '0a' ->  ''
      '99j0i0y7g' -> 'JJJJJJJJJjjjjjjjjjggggggg'
      
If the input is an empty string the output should also be an empty string. Don't worry about handling input errors as the input will always be a valid string
